name: Animals Around The Equator - Beautiful free puzzle game for toddlers and kids
name_original: Animals Around The Equator - Beautiful free puzzle game for toddlers and kids
description:
Your Child is about to undertake a journey through the world of the lands around the equator.

In the course of up to 15 scenarios, your Child will playfully get to know everything about animals, and will thus train his- or her- gift of imagination, intellect, skills and combination capacities.
